ygData.subject: Staminia and HP's
ygData.msgSnippet: I would like to get responses on what is your Sta. and HP s per lvl as a warrior and what race you chose. I am a Ogre Sta. 142 and get 31 to 33 HP s a lvl I am
ygData.messageBody:
I would like to get responses on what is your Sta. and HP's per lvl as a
warrior and what race you chose.

I am a Ogre Sta. 142 and get 31 to 33 HP's a lvl

I am thinking about going to the next new server and starting over but ill
test alot of the warrior race/stats out to see what will give the best
benefit.

Also if you go Agnostic as a Troll or Oger how hard is it to get into Good
Citys / Areas.

Grimspear 16th lvl warrior on Taraw marr
